attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC has moved from global cooling hysteria to global warming hysteria. It refuses to engage with the Channel Four documentary-Global warming swindle. The medieval warm period and the increase in temperature between 40's and 70's (despite industrial carbon output) show climate always fluctuates. We are made of carbon.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
